item.title: Fresh install - OSX
item.description: As a reminder to my future self, here is my personal recipe for new fresh install. Yes it looks like holiday is a great time to update OSX to the new and shiny one. Install OSX - then re-install OSX Format the hard drive with Disk Utility between the 2 installs âŒ˜ + R on star tup Get .dotfile and .ssh keys From only you know where :-) and set right permissions
